level.heading: Authorization of Director to promulgate regulations.
level.text: The Director shall have the authority to implement the basic business license system outlined in this subchapter by appropriate regulation.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 2(s) of Streamlining Regulation Emergency Act of 2003 (D.C. Act 15-145, August 11, 2003, 50 DCR 6896).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-261, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2801.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of Authority Pursuant to D.C. Law 5-84, the District of Columbia Funeral Services Regulatory Act of 1984, see Mayor's Order 2007-216, October 5, 2007 (55 DCR 149).

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Short title of title II of D.C. Law 12-261: Section 2001 of D.C. Law 12-261 provided that title II of the act may be cited as the Business Regulatory Reform Act of 1998.
